msg: HADOOP-2798.  Added PoweredBy link to left navigation bar.

author: sichen
msg: Add support for calculating prices based on survey responses in the cart.

author: stack
msg: HBASE-56 Unnecessary HQLClient Object creation in a shell loop

author: andreas
msg: Throw SourceNotFoundException instead of RuntimeException in AggregatingSource.getInputStream(). Otherwise the IncludeProcessor doesn't trigger the fallback but re-throws the exception.

author: buschmi
msg: LUCENE-1169: Fixed bug in IndexSearcher.search(): searching with a filter might miss some hits because scorer.skipTo() is called without checking if the scorer is already at the right position.
